Content.Text:
<NAME_MOB_SCHULTZ>
Hmm. I see you're a fan of the color blue. You
and I will get along well.

<NAME_MOB_SCHULTZ>
Black, huh? ...You have good taste.

<NAME_MOB_SCHULTZ>
My, what a comfortable abode! When I'm
looking at someone else's quality decor, I always
feel like I'm in my own home...

<NAME_MOB_SCHULTZ>
This place feels so...stifling. Took me a second
to figure out why...then I realized it's because of
the decor. I guess it's not SO bad, though...

<NAME_MOB_SCHULTZ>
Well, now, it's a wooden park bench! I was just
thinking I needed to sit down for a moment.
<PAGE>
Time to kick back and take a load off!

<NAME_MOB_SCHULTZ>
My house is made of wood too, but something
about the way the wood was used in this
column's construction is just marvelous!

<NAME_MOB_SCHULTZ>
What in the world is this "garden parasol" used
for?
<PAGE>
...Ah, it's a beach umbrella, isn't it? Why didn't
you just say so, then? ...I have no use for a
beach umbrella. Next!

<NAME_MOB_SCHULTZ>
Mmmm... I envy you. I wish I had something
like this in my garden!

<NAME_MOB_SCHULTZ>
...Looks like a castle from a fairy tale. I must
say, it's quite well-made!

<NAME_MOB_SCHULTZ>
While I was traveling all over the world, I could
swear I saw this once before. But where was
I...? Hmmmm...

<NAME_MOB_SCHULTZ>
Wh-what was that? Did you hear it?! It came
from beneath our feet...

<NAME_MOB_SCHULTZ>
Hmm...a fence made of bamboo? Not bad. Not
bad at all. And... *sniff* ...it smells simply
amazing!

<NAME_MOB_SCHULTZ>
What on earth... You have truly bad taste in
fences, you know that?

<NAME_MOB_SCHULTZ>
Hmm? Are you trying to hold me back, wall? I
shan't be kept at bay by the likes of you!

<NAME_MOB_SCHULTZ>
I came all this way to shop, but my expectations
flew too close to the sun. Now down they fall,
aflame with disappointment.

<NAME_MOB_SCHULTZ>
This town still feels undeveloped, but it has its
fair share of quality products available. I look
forward to coming back again sometime...

<NAME_MOB_SCHULTZ>
There's much to buy here. I will most assuredly
be back many times.

<NAME_MOB_SCHULTZ>
I'm impressed with the rarity of my findings here
today. I came far to shop here, but it was well
worth my time.

<NAME_MOB_SCHULTZ>
Hush, now! I'm negotiating...

<NAME_MOB_SCHULTZ>
Yes? I'm rather busy at the moment, so if you'll
excuse me...

<NAME_MOB_SCHULTZ>
This town is...lonely.

<NAME_MOB_SCHULTZ>
The selection of products here is wider than last
time I came. This must be a town of hard
workers.

<NAME_MOB_SCHULTZ>
Craftsmen speak of this town often. They say if
you want to buy high-quality goods, this is the
place to be.

<NAME_MOB_SCHULTZ>
There are so many things you can find nowhere
else in the world...except right here. It truly is a
paradise for treasure-seekers such as I...
